meanings.definition: A high-performance alloy that exhibits excellent mechanical strength and resistance to corrosion at high temperatures.
meanings.sent1: The superalloy used in the jet engine made it more powerful.
meanings.sent2: The aerospace industry relies on superalloys for their durability in extreme conditions.
meanings.sent3: The superalloy walked into the furnace and said, 'I can take the heat!'
meanings.sent4: Her determination was a superalloy, unyielding to the pressures of life.
meanings.sent5: The superalloy gleamed like a superhero, impervious to the villainous forces of rust and wear.
